  "description": "LD&amp;D Consulting - We provide end-to-end solutions inRecruitment, Training &amp; Development, HR Outsourcing, and Payroll Managementacross a wide range of industries&mdash;including Telecoms, IT, Construction, Transportation, Energy, Sports, Environment, Healthcare, Banking &amp; Finance, Professional Services, and Consulting&mdash;serving both the private and public sectors.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Human Resource Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Amuwo-odofin, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The Human Resource Manager will be responsible for managing all HR functions within the institution.
	This includes recruitment, staff development, performance management, employee relations, and ensuring compliance with labor laws and school policies.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and implement HR policies and procedures that align with the school&rsquo;s vision and goals.
	Oversee the recruitment and onboarding of teaching and non-teaching staff.
	Manage employee records, contracts, and payroll in compliance with statutory requirements.
	Coordinate training and professional development programs for staff.
	Handle employee relations, grievances, and conflict resolution in a fair and professional manner.
	Ensure compliance with labor laws, health and safety regulations, and education sector standards.
	Support management in workforce planning and organizational development.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or related field (Master&rsquo;s degree is an advantage).
	Professional HR certification (CIPM, SHRM, CIPD, or equivalent) is desirable.
	Minimum of 3- 5 years of HR management experience, preferably in the education sector.
	Strong knowledge of labor laws and HR best practices.
	Excellent communication, interpersonal, and leadership skills.
	Ability to handle confidential information with discretion.


Salary
N200,000 - N250,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;ife@ldd-consulting.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Job Position: Human Resource Manager

	Develop and implement HR policies and procedures that align with the school’s vision and goals.
	Oversee the recruitment and onboarding of teaching and non-teaching staff.
	Manage employee records, contracts, and payroll in compliance with statutory requirements.
	Coordinate training and professional development programs for staff.

  "title": "Restaurant Manager",
  "description": "Oisedotcom Limited -&nbsp;&nbsp;We are an e-com business that deals in sales of products ranging across a diverse verities of categories including household equipment, home appliances, vehicle gadgets, phone gadgets, security etc.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Restaurant Manager
Job Location:&nbsp;Gbagada, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Manage restaurant&rsquo;s good image and suggest ways to improve it
	The Ideal candidate will deliver a high-quality menu, ensure efficient restaurant operation and motivate staff to maintain highproductivity and deliver uality,customer-service standards.
	Will partake in the hiring, training, and supervise restaurant employees
	Restaurant Manager responsibilities include maintaining the restaurant&#39;s revenue, profitability and quality goals.
	Control operational costs and identify measures to cut waste
	Create detailed reports on weekly, monthly and annual revenues and expenses
	Create staff schedule to ensure appropriate staffing.
	Track stock levels of food, supplies, and equipment, forecast needs, and oversee ordering as necessary.
	Take ownership of budgets and cost control methods to minimize expenses.
	Address customer needs, comments, and complaints
	Adhere to and enforce employee compliance with health, safety, and sanitation standards.
	Maintain all relevant records
	Ensure all employees are working within outlined operating standards.
	Appraise staff performance and provide feedback to improve productivity
	Report on financial performance, inventory, and personnel
	To be successful in this role, the ideal candidate will need management skills and experience in both front and back of the house, know how to oversee the dining room, check-in with customers and balance seating capacity.
	Back of the house management experience is also essential, the ideal candidates will set work schedules, oversee food preparation and make sure staff complies with health and safety restaurant regulations.
	As a restaurant manager, the ideal candidate is expected to lead by example, keep other staff motivated during busy moments in a fast-paced environment, ensure the smooth running of the restaurant, and ensure customer satisfaction.
	Promote the brand in the local community through word-of-mouth and restaurant events
	Recommend ways to reach a broader audience (e.g. discounts and social media ads)
	Implement policies and protocols that will maintain future restaurant operations
	Requirements.


Qualifications


	B.Sc Degree in Business Administration; hospitality management or culinary schooling is a plus.
	Minimum of 3 years proven work experience as a Restaurant Manager, Restaurant General Manager, Hospitality Manager or similar role.
	Proven customer service experience as a manager.
	Extensive food and beverage (F&amp;B) knowledge, with ability to remember and recall ingredients and dishes to inform customers and wait staff
	Familiarity with restaurant management software.
	Strong leadership, motivational and people skills
	Acute financial management skills.


Salary
N150,000 - N200,000 per month.&nbsp;

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;bennyboomhr@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Restaurant Manager Job at Oisedotcom Limited




        
    

        
        Oisedotcom Limited -  We are an e-com business that deals in sales of products ranging across a diverse verities of categories including household equipment, home appliances, vehicle gadgets, phone gadgets, security etc.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Restaurant Manager
Job Location: Gbagada, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Manage restaurant’s good image and suggest ways to improve it
	The Ideal candidate will deliver a high-quality menu, ensure efficient restaurant operation and motivate staff to maintain highproductivity and deliver uality,customer-service standards.
	Will partake in the hiring, training, and supervise restaurant employees
	Restaurant Manager responsibilities include maintaining the restaurant's revenue, profitability and quality goals.
	Control operational costs and identify measures to cut waste
	Create detailed reports on weekly, monthly and annual revenues and expenses
	Create staff schedule to ensure appropriate staffing.
	Track stock levels of food, supplies, and equipment, forecast needs, and oversee ordering as necessary.
	Take ownership of budgets and cost control methods to minimize expenses.
	Address customer needs, comments, and complaints
	Adhere to and enforce employee compliance with health, safety, and sanitation standards.
	Maintain all relevant records
	Ensure all employees are working within outlined operating standards.
	Appraise staff performance and provide feedback to improve productivity
	Report on financial performance, inventory, and personnel
	To be successful in this role, the ideal candidate will need management skills and experience in both front and back of the house, know how to oversee the dining room, check-in with customers and balance seating capacity.
	Back of the house management experience is also essential, the ideal candidates will set work schedules, oversee food preparation and make sure staff complies with health and safety restaurant regulations.
	As a restaurant manager, the ideal candidate is expected to lead by example, keep other staff motivated during busy moments in a fast-paced environment, ensure the smooth running of the restaurant, and ensure customer satisfaction.
	Promote the brand in the local community through word-of-mouth and restaurant events
	Recommend ways to reach a broader audience (e.g. discounts and social media ads)
	Implement policies and protocols that will maintain future restaurant operations
	Requirements.


Qualifications


	B.Sc Degree in Business Administration; hospitality management or culinary schooling is a plus.
	Minimum of 3 years proven work experience as a Restaurant Manager, Restaurant General Manager, Hospitality Manager or similar role.
	Proven customer service experience as a manager.
	Extensive food and beverage (F&B) knowledge, with ability to remember and recall ingredients and dishes to inform customers and wait staff
	Familiarity with restaurant management software.
	Strong leadership, motivational and people skills
	Acute financial management skills.


Salary
N150,000 - N200,000 per month. 

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: bennyboomhr@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Job openings at Auldon Limited
content:
Auldon Limited is a toy trading company strategically located in the commercial centre of idumota Lagos Nigeria, it is a wholesale distribution organization servicing major departmental stores, Multi-National Organizations and educational institutions within Nigeria and its sub-region. Founded as Arigold Toys in 1996 before transforming into a limited liability company, with the registration RC-439491 and named auldon limited in the year 2002.
     

            
    



Auldon limited is famously known internationally for pioneering the African Themed Unity Girls Dolls, a collection of 14-inch dolls, each representing Nigeria’s three major tribes which promotes cultural inclusion amongst Africans and her diaspora communities. The product is being created to deliver an empowering social message to girls around Nigeria and the world at large.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Finance Manager

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are currently recruiting for a Financial Manager that will analyze everyday financial activities and subsequently provide advice and guidance to upper management on future financial plans.
	The goal is to enable the company’s leaders to make sound business decisions and meet the company’s objectives.
	In this role, you will have the opportunity to utilize your expertise in financial analysis and strategic planning.
	By analyzing day-to-day financial activities with precision, you will provide valuable insights and recommendations to upper management.
	Your guidance will empower the company’s leaders to make informed decisions that align with the organization’s long-term goals.


Key Responsibilities


	Analyze daily sales reports and financial statements for trends and discrepancies.
	Prepare and present financial performance reports to senior management
	Oversee operations of the finance department, set goals and objectives, and design a framework for these to be met.
	Ensuring all finance and accounting operations comply with generally accepted accounting principles and federal and state laws and regulations.
	Ensuring day-to-day transactions such as accounts payable, cash receipts and accounts receivable, credit card transactions, and payroll are recorded properly.
	Performing fiscal year-end close activities and assisting with activities and requirements of external auditors.
	Review and approve expenditure requests within designated limits.
	Oversee reconciliation of general ledger accounts and bank statements


Required Skills


	Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Accounting, Business Administration, or a related field.
	Minimum of 5 years of experience in a finance or accounting role, with at least 2 years in a managerial position.
	 Proven experience in retail finance or a similar industry.
	Strong knowledge of financial reporting, budgeting, and forecasting.
	Experience in cash flow management and financial modeling.
	Familiarity with accounting software and enterprise resource planning (ERP) systems.
	Ability to prepare and present comprehensive financial reports to senior management.
	Strong understanding of inventory management and cost-reduction strategies.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite, especially Excel.
	Experience in preparing monthly, quarterly, and annual financial statements.
	Familiarity with tax filing requirements and coordination with tax advisors
	Certified Accountant (CPA), Chartered Financial Analyst (CFA), or ICAN is a plus.


Application Closing Date: 8th September, 2025. 

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: Operations@auldontoys.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.


2.) Sales Representative

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Auldon toys s currently recruiting for a sales representative who will understands customer product needs, and recommends merchandise to drive sales and meet targets. Key responsibilities include processing transactions, managing inventory, maintaining store presentation, providing excellent customer service, Strong communication skills and also with a customer-focused mindset.


Responsibilities


	Greet and direct customers
	Provide accurate information (e.g. product features, pricing and after-sales services)
	Answer customers’ questions about specific products/services
	Conduct price and feature comparisons to facilitate purchasing
	Cross-sell products
	Ensure racks are fully stocked
	Manage returns of merchandise
	Coordinate with the Retail Sales Representatives team to provide excellent customer service (especially during peak times)
	Inform customers about discounts and special offers


Requirements and skills


	B.Sc in Marketing or related field is a must
	Proven work experience as a Retail Sales Representative, Sales Associate or similar role
	Understanding of the retail sales process
	Familiarity with consumer behavior principles
	Knowledge of inventory stocking procedures
	Basic math skills
	Track record of achieving sales quotas
	Excellent communication skills, capable of building trusting relationships
	Ability to perform in fast-paced environments
	Flexibility to work various shifts


Salary
N150,000 - N200,000 monthly.

Application Closing Date: 1st September, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: Operations@auldontoys.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

3.) E-Commerce Manager

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	We are currently recruiting for an E-Commerce Manager who will be responsible for the overall strategy, operations, and performance of a company's online sales channels.
	He/She will develop and implement strategies to drive revenue growth, manage online stores, innovate new digital experiences, and oversee product rollouts.
	This role requires a blend of strategic thinking, technical skills, and strong communication abilities.


Key Responsibilities


	Developing and Executing E-commerce Strategy: This includes setting goals, identifying target audiences, and defining the overall online sales approach.
	Managing Online Stores: Ensuring the website is functioning optimally, managing product listings, and optimizing the user experience to increase sales and customer satisfaction.
	Overseeing Product Rollouts: Translating commercial goals into briefs for creative and website development teams, and implementing changes to the online store for new product launches.
	Innovating New Digital Experiences: Staying up-to-date with industry trends, analyzing website data, and brainstorming new ideas to improve the online customer experience.
	Building and Maintaining E-commerce Websites: This includes managing product pages, landing pages, and other aspects of the website's functionality.
	Communication: Effectively communicating the needs of the e-commerce channel to other departments and understanding the needs of other teams to ensure alignment and collaboration.
	Data Analysis: Analyzing website data, sales figures, and customer behavior to identify areas for improvement and make data-driven decisions.


Required Qualifications and Skills


	Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, E-Commerce, IT, or a related field.
	3-5 years of experience as an e-commerce manager or in a similar e commerce or digital marketing role.
	Strong understanding of digital marketing and e-commerce technologies • Experience with e-commerce platforms (e.g., Shopify)
	Proven track record of driving revenue growth
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
	Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities
	Leadership and team management experience
	Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously


Salary
N250,000 - N300,000 monthly.

Application Closing Date: 1st September, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: operations@auldontoys.com using Job Position as the subject of the mail.
